What's Crypto.com?

Crypto.com is a leading cryptocurrency exchange offering a range of trading services including spot trading and various financial products, all through a user-friendly and secure platform.

  • Spot and advanced trading
  • Competitive fees
  • Robust security measures
  • User-friendly experience

What can you trade with Crypto.com?

With Crypto.com, you can trade the following:

  • Spot Trading: Quantity is measured in base asset units. Your account must have sufficient base and quote balances to trade in both directions.
  • Perpetuals: Quantity is measured in base asset units.

API Key Setup Process

Follow the steps below to configure your API keys for Crypto.com.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your API keys with anyone. We use industry-standard encryption to secure your credentials.' %}

1 Create a Crypto.com Account

If you donâ€™t already have a Crypto.com account, please sign up here.

2 Navigate to API Management

  1. Log in to your Crypto.com account.
  2. Click on your profile icon in the top-right corner.
  3. Select Manage Account from the dropdown menu.

3 Create an API Key

  1. Go to API Management.
  2. Click Create API Key.
  3. Give your API key a descriptive name.
  4. Save the provider Secret key; you'll need it later.

4 Configure API Settings

  1. Click Edit on the API key that you just created.
  2. Enable trading for your API key.
  3. Paste our server's IP address in the IP whitelist field: {{ server_ip }}
  4. Click Continue to complete the setup.

Complete Integration

Once you have your API keys, return to our platform's Automate section and use them to link your Crypto.com account with our automation system. This will enable automated trading based on your TradingView alerts.
